text: Sayyid Hassan Aghaee Firouzabadi (; 3 February 1951 â€“ 3 September 2021) was an Iranian ophthalmologist, military officer and a member of the Expediency Discernment Council. He was the Chief-of-Staff of the Iranian Armed Forces from 1989 to 2016. He was a senior military advisor to the Supreme Leader of Iran. Firouzabadi died on 3 September 2021 at age 70 in Tehran. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Iranian generals Category:People from Mashhad
title: Hassan Firouzabadi
